transcript:
spot or speck of dust, stood before a looking glass and brushed the hair on his temples up- wards, in the way affected by the Emperor Alexander, and, having assured himself from the way Rostov looked at it that his coat had been noticed, left the room with a pleasant smile. 
"Oh dear, what a beast I am!" muttered Ros- tov, as he read the letter. 
"Why?" 
"Oh, what a pig I am, not to have written and to have given them such a fright! Oh, what a pig I am!" he repeated, flushing suddenly. "Well, h
